scripts.build:all: bun run build:ui && bun run build:server && bun run build:cli
scripts.prod:server: PORT=2357 DATA_DIR=~/.maestro/data SESSION_DIR=~/.maestro/sessions NODE_ENV=production node maestro-server/dist/server.js
scripts.staging:server: PORT=3002 DATA_DIR=~/.maestro-staging/data SESSION_DIR=~/.maestro-staging/sessions NODE_ENV=development node maestro-server/dist/server.js
scripts.staging: concurrently "bun run staging:server" "cd maestro-ui && VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3002/api VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:3002 bunx tauri dev"
